content: I had no idea that when talking about meats impossible meat meant plant meat. Bought an impossible breakfast sandwich from Starbucks and was confused as to why it tasted weird. 😖🙅🏽‍♂️

MORE CRAP FAST FOOD JUNK served b Min. Wage workers!TakeAction: Tell Congress to require pre-market safety-testing for genetically engineered foods like @ImpossibleFoods Impossible Burger. This #GMO fake meat should also be labeled! https://t.co/Gu98nsCnFB
Impossible burger meat almost smells too much like real meat and grosses me out sometimes
